name: Mubert
about: An AI music generator that creates royalty-free soundtracks for videos, podcasts, and creative projects.
summary: Generate royalty-free background music for your content.
details: Mubert helps creators produce endless music streams tailored to mood, genre, or energy level — perfect for YouTube, podcasts, and apps.
howTo: Create a Mubert account and open the generator.
Choose your genre, tempo, and mood settings.
Download loops or full-length tracks for your content.
Use tracks freely with Mubert’s creator license.
